info.title: EventMobi API V1 Spec
info.description:
Eventmobi Public API documentation

Note: To use json response, please add ".json" at the end of each request.

APIKeySecurity.name: X-API-KEY
APIKeySecurity.description: Please ask for your API Key from support team

get.summary: get specific event info with sections
get.description: This is getting the general event info with all section settings. The Speaker, Attendee, Sessions and other data are all stored in different sections, as the "type" in section data indicated.

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: the short code of specific event.

allOf.description: the general envelope for all responses. The "response" section will be different for each endpoint

message.description: the error message will be included here

post.description: This is updated basic event info only. To change sessions or items, please use the sections/{section_id} or items/{item_id} to access. Please refer to the EventChangeRequest model definition.

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: the short code of specific event.

event_name_full.description: Name of event. Must be included but can be updated.

allOf.description: the general envelope for all responses. The "response" section will be different for each endpoint

event.description: the ID of the event updated

message.description: the error message will be included here
the error message will be included here

get.summary: get specific section info with items
get.description: This is getting the general section info with all items data and custom fields if they're available. The Speaker, Attendee, Sessions and other data are all stored in different sections, as the "type" in section data indicated.

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: the short code of specific event.

parameters.name: section_id
parameters.description: the section ID of specific event.

allOf.description: the general envelope for all responses. The "response" section will be different for each endpoint

allOf.title: items
allOf.description: the items are only showing in section GET request, not in event GET request.

config.description: the config meta object with properties

message.description: the error message will be included here

post.description: This will update section settings. Please refer to the SectionChangeRequest model definition.

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: the short code of specific event.

parameters.name: section_id
parameters.description: the section ID of specific event.

position.description: position of section in section list (required)

type.description: type of section (one of agenda, speakers, companies, attendees)(required)

allOf.description: the general envelope for all responses. The "response" section will be different for each endpoint

event.description: the ID of the section updated

message.description: the error message will be included here
the error message will be included here

post.summary: add a new item in section
post.description: Add a new item in specific section. Must be the same type, e.g. Attendee, Session, etc. Please refer to the SectionChangeRequest model definition.

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: the short code of specific event.

parameters.name: section_id
parameters.description: the section ID of specific event.

schema.description: Please use different properties for different section type. Currently, sessions and attendees are supported.

speakers.description: ***Session***: comma separated list of speakers by external ids

tracks.description: ***Session***: comma separated list of tracks by external ids

attendees.description: ***Session***: comma separated list of attendees by emails

filename.description: ***Attendee***: name of previously uploaded image file

custom_fields[custom_field_id].description: ***Attendee***: value for this custom field. Once you have the Custom Field settings from section request, you can use the id within to assign values, E.g. custom_fields[40211]: "Custom Field Value". You may have multiple custom fields included.

external_id.description: ***Shared***: your code for representing this item

allOf.description: the general envelope for all responses. The "response" section will be different for each endpoint

event.description: the ID of the item added

message.description: the error message will be included here

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: the short code of specific event.

parameters.name: section_id
parameters.description: the section ID of specific event.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: the item ID of specific event.

allOf.description: the general envelope for all responses. The "response" section will be different for each endpoint

allOf.title: items
allOf.description: the items are only showing in section GET request, not in event GET request.

config.description: the config meta object with properties

message.description: the error message will be included here

post.description: Update item data in specific section. Must be the same type, e.g. Attendee, Session, etc. Please refer to the SectionChangeRequest model definition.

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: the short code of specific event.

parameters.name: section_id
parameters.description: the section ID of specific event.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: the item ID of specific event.

schema.description: Please use different properties for different section type. Currently, sessions and attendees are supported.

speakers.description: ***Session***: comma separated list of speakers by external ids

tracks.description: ***Session***: comma separated list of tracks by external ids

attendees.description: ***Session***: comma separated list of attendees by emails

filename.description: ***Attendee***: name of previously uploaded image file

custom_fields[custom_field_id].description: ***Attendee***: value for this custom field. Once you have the Custom Field settings from section request, you can use the id within to assign values, E.g. custom_fields[40211]: "Custom Field Value". You may have multiple custom fields included.

external_id.description: ***Shared***: your code for representing this item

allOf.description: the general envelope for all responses. The "response" section will be different for each endpoint

event.description: the ID of the section updated

message.description: the error message will be included here

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: the item ID of specific event.

parameters.name: section_id
parameters.description: the section ID of specific event.

parameters.name: external_item_id
parameters.description: the external item ID of specific event for integration.

parameters.name: external_item_id
parameters.description: the external item ID of specific event for integration.
